tasks.label: Start Backend Only
tasks.command: wsl -d Ubuntu -e bash -c 'cd /mnt/d/jarwis-ai-pentest && source .venv-wsl/bin/activate && nohup python -m uvicorn api.server:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 > logs/backend_wsl.log 2>&1 & echo Backend started with PID $!'

tasks.label: Start Backend Only (Dev Mode)
tasks.command: Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'wsl -d Ubuntu -e bash -c "cd /mnt/d/jarwis-ai-pentest && source .venv-wsl/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn api.server:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload"' -WindowStyle Normal

tasks.label: Start Frontend Only
tasks.command: Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd D:\jarwis-ai-pentest\jarwisfrontend; $env:BROWSER="none"; npm start' -WindowStyle Normal
